413950.name: Robotpencil Presents: Design with Confidence
413950.description:
This video covers the basic things you will need to help you start to understand design! From studying to retaining a solid visual library! Also featuring tools and panels found in the Advance Photoshop 1 video.

Includes
-HiRes PSD, JPEG
-Photoshop Tools
